title: High-Speed HTTP Automation
tools: Raw HTTP Requests | Session Spoofing | Tor Routing | Linux Deployment
description: Built a highly efficient headless automation system for interacting with a web-based API via direct HTTP requests. Deployed on a self-hosted server with IP cycling.

title: Large-Scale Email Automation
tools: Email Validation | Address Spoofing | Form Automation | Rate-Limiting Bypass
description: Engineered an automated pipeline to simulate high-volume email registrations across constrained web forms. Focused on reliable delivery, error handling, and adaptive throttling.
